summary:
THE NEW AVATARS - Presenting a new triumvirate of truly trauma-inducing thugs who are here to invade the Ethereum scene with their own brand of derpness. Dumbledore, Trump and Knuckles have banded together to form a coin that they wanted to name Pepe but were beaten to the bunch, so they did the next best thing - force the issue by giving it a different, longer and more autistic-sounding name.

 OF AUTISM - LAY OFF YOUR STASH FOR A BIT AND CHECK OUT THE NITTY-GRITTY OF THIS COIN, YEAH? AS YOU CAN SEE, EVERYTHING CHECKS OUT! THIS SHIT'S L-E-G-I-T!
